general.gigTitle: develop a unique wordpress website using elementor

sellerCard.oneLiner: WordPress Web Dev, App Dev, IG Expert
sellerCard.description:
Hi Fiverr community! 

My name is Elon and I am a Fiverr Pro seller with over 7 years of Social Media Marketing experience. I'm passionate about organic growth methods for instagram including creating strategic plans for businesses & individuals looking to improve their digital presence.

I have worked with over 1300 customers ranging from individuals, small businesses to international brands in hundreds of different market segments. 

My background & higher education is in Economics, Marketing & Business Management.

Looking forward to working with you!

description.content:
Looking for a professional website for your business, e-commerce or personal use? 


Having a digital presence in today's day and age is essential for anyone. A website can make or break the success of your brand and a high quality site impacts everything from the amount of visitors you get to how trustworthy your brand looks to potential clients & visitors.


I don't just develop websites. I take an in-depth look into your goals, your brand and your target audience to create a synergy between your online presence and your message. I work with Wordpress & WooCommerce and have 12+ years of experience.


What will you get?


  • SEO Friendly website
  • Lightweight design that makes browsing quick & efficient
  • Bespoke design Elements based on Your Vision
  • Free Lifetime SSL Certificate & integration
  • Responsive Web Design 
  • E-Commerce implementation & Set-Up (premium)
  • Available for any Questions & Support


How will this gig benefit Your business or personal brand?


  • Stand out from Competition 
  • Increase Credibility
  • Showcase Your Brand to prospective Customers
  • Increase Leads & Sales
  • Be found in Google Search results


Message me if You have any questions or wish to discuss a custom order.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What do I need to share to get started?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: To get started I require your domain name or desired domain name, logo if you have, names & number of pages you wish to have on the website, brief/information about your company and the website you want & any examples of websites that you like.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide hosting & domain name registration?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, all packages include cloud storage and domain name if required but only for 1 year. We can extend it for additional cost.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you design responsive websites?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, all designs are lightweight, very quick to browse and will fit all screen sizes including laptops, computers, mobile phones, tablets & projectors.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can I request a custom offer?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Sure, message me and we can discuss your needs in detail! :)

questionsAndAnswers.question: What is the process of your work?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: After receiving all the requirements and your brief, I will send you the initial design between 3-7 days for feedback. If you're happy, I will commence with developing the website and share it as soon as I'm finished. Happy to answer any questions you might have afterwards.

reviews.comment:
Exceptional Work & Attention to Detail!
I want to sincerely thank you for your dedication, attention to detail, and collaboration throughout the process of building my website and business brand. Your expertise, patience, and willingness to refine every aspect to match my vision truly made a difference. I appreciate your professionalism and creative input, and I look forward to working with you again in the future. Highly recommend!

Best,
Dina

seller_response.comment: Thank you so much for trusting us with creating a brand new website for you and wish you all the success for the future! Should you have any questions, I’m just a message away so don’t hesitate to get in touch 🙏

reviews.comment: Elon B. exceeded my expectations with his PROFESSIONALISM and superb ATTENTION TO DETAILS. Working with him was a breeze, thanks to his language fluency and proactive communication. Thank you so much, very attentive to all the details! Will definitely use again if I need another website. 👍

seller_response.comment: Thank you much for the order and kind words! Integration of these custom solutions was right amount of challenging and exciting to figure out. Pleasure to work with such a consummate professional and a clear, concise communicator. Keep in touch for launch and if you have any questions or small changes in the mean time, I'm just a message away. 🙏

reviews.comment:
I had the pleasure of working with Elon to design and develop my website, and I couldn't be happier with the results. From start to finish, Elon was incredibly communicative, responding to my questions promptly and keeping me updated throughout the entire process. He worked quickly while maintaining a high standard of quality, and he took the time to fully understand my website plan, ensuring that the final product best represented the direction I provided in my very thorough website write-up.

Elon not only delivered a polished, professional website that makes my business appear much larger than it is, but he also provided comprehensive website documentation, making it easy for me to manage the site moving forward. I highly recommend Elon to any small business owner looking for a top-notch website that truly elevates their brand!

seller_response.comment: Thank you so much for Your thoughtful & kind review! It was a pleasure working on your website and I'm thrilled you are happy with the final delivery. Excited to see your brand grow and flourish. P.S. Always here for you in case you need any help or have questions on how to modify the site 🙏

reviews.comment: always a pleasure working with Elon

seller_response.comment: Thank you so much for another great order, pleasure working on your websites and if you have any questions you know I'm always here for you! 🙏

reviews.comment: Elon is 10/10 communication and product exceeded my expectations.

seller_response.comment: Thank you so much for the order and kind words! Looking forward to working on your second website and should you have any questions, feel free to message me any time 🙏
